website_summaries.verdict: This is a great pool for elementary school age children and it doesn’t take long to set up.
pros: This comes with a cartridge filter on the pump, which is easy to clean
Take the cartridge out of the pump and wash it off with the garden hose
Filling the pool takes an afternoon
cons: Customer service is less than stellar
It is a good pool as long as you don’t need anything fixed or replaced

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure about getting this small pool, but it turned out perfect. We were looking at taller (48') pools, but the only sizes available were either way too big or way too expensive. 30" turned out to be perfect. We're two adults, 50-60's, average health. This is easy to get into, even tho we just happened to have a double step for it. If you are shorter than 5'6", you might need a step to keep from racking privates! Also, warms up quickly, so refreshing without stopping your heart! We have it tucked away in a secluded corner of yard... perfect for midnight skinny dip!! Lol!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pump stopped working within a month & it already has holes!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if we just got a bum shipment or what but the pump stopped working within a month & there were holes in it after 2 months (I even have it protected/on a smooth surface). Now it's leaking 4 inches a day everywhere & doesn't filter AT ALL. We still have 3 months or more of blazing hot summer left where I live. So disappointed to have wasted my money on this for this season. I need a refund or a replacement. :-(
customer_reviews.author: JeepgirlS

customer_reviews.title: Super cute pool!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little pool. It's perfect for what I need. My husband and I set it up in under an hour. I did buy the larger pump for it. It's so refreshing and easy to maintain. We put it on a concrete pad under a gazebo. It's fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Karen R.

customer_reviews.title: Backyard oasis
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter loves this pool! She can reach so its perfect for her to learn how to swim without floaties, which she has relied on before this. It's also big enough for me and my husband to get in with her. The only downfall, which isnt a huge deal, is that it is slightly lopsided only because the ground isnt totally level. Overall I think it was well worth the money. This summer is going to be a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Set pool up over weekend never had a chance to use it. Put layer of sand and a double heavy duty tarp down before filling Water started pooling underneath the liner with no evident rip looks to be coming from a seam. Contacted manufacturer and spent an hour on the phone due to a language barrier. First I was told I needed to repair the brand new pool myself then Was told I needed to cut out several areas of the pool liner including logo drain and fill out various forms and supply sales receipt and mail it all at my own expense to them before they could even help me.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice dunking pool. Easy to set up. Pretty sturdy once assembled. Perfect fit for my small yard. Small footprint. I wanted something that I could put up and disassemble pretty easily and that’s what I got with this pool. I used a total of 36 pads to place underneath the pool. Six pads per package that you can purchase on amazon as well. I also purchased the Clorox extra blue small pool kit to keep it sparkly. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: ac

customer_reviews.title: Great pool for the price
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 6 year old for the summer. We have a large deck so we set it up there. It was so easy to assemble and had no problems getting it put together. It's the perfect size for our son to swim around and is going to give us hours of play time over the summer instead of having to fight the gym pool crowd and trying to find a shady spot in the summer heat. So happy we purchased this!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun but not for long...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and was great....for a few weeks. One morning I noticed a pinhole leak. We began draining it to patch the hole but by the afternoon another hole had sprung. Before we could even drain the pool it opened up to a fist size hole and flooded my yard.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M White

customer_reviews.title: Great pool!
customer_reviews.text: A great size pool! My 2 yr old loves it with her water wings. Even if we fill it up 3/4 of the way it is refreshing and fun to be in. Pretty easy installation , needs two people though. The only thing that needs improvement would be a water release hole to be Lower(!!) To the ground. I let the water out to clean the fresh water pool... but it doesn’t empty completely. I then have to use a wet vac to get the rest of the water out. So it is quite the process.
customer_reviews.author: S. Z.

customer_reviews.title: Use A Ground Cover!
customer_reviews.text: After a week of heavy rain, my pool was completely drained. Found a weed growing through the bottom liner. Patched the hole, sprayed a weed killer and put down a 3.5 ml liner doubled. Otherwise, a great pool. Easy to put up (did it by myself), perfect plunge pool. The filter works great, got a ladder for convenience. My first time in it, I could feel every little twig and bump. It seems that the bottom of the liner is thinner than the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Mark F.

customer_reviews.title: Pump died after 2 1/2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I buy this pool every year, without a pump this pool is junk.i called Amazon today, after 2 1/2 weeks using the pool the pump died. Grinding noise, it was terrible and finally gave out. I will never buy another pool online again.This is a case of far too many options locally. The next time I buy something over $100.00 I will find a local store incase I have this problem again.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Powers

customer_reviews.title: Great pool for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great pool and works perfect for a three-year-old and seven-year-old. Very easy to assemble and plenty sturdy. I like how it’s tall enough to where they can’t crawl in and out on their own so an adult has to be there. My only knock On this whole transaction is that we specifically ordered from this company on a Thursday morning with guaranteed delivery by Saturday, and even paid about $10 more than other vendors. It didn’t even ship until Friday night, meaning it sat their warehouse for over 30 hours, which caused it to arrive four days late. Not a big deal, just wish I would’ve known that in the beginning.
customer_reviews.author: aksteve77

customer_reviews.title: Best $120 purchase of the season
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for an above ground children's play pool and also just the right size to relax and float in for one or two adults. The grandkids love it. It's the perfect depth for them. I assembled this and it was ready to fill in 35 minutes. A lot of reviews do not like the small filter but it has worked well. The water is crystal clear. I do keep the pool covered and did purchase exercise padding squares for safety and to protect the bottom of the pool. Buy this one over any inflatable models. Very sturdy and a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: STF

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend finding a different pool
customer_reviews.text: Constructed the entire pool, and filled it with water only to find out that there are pin holes all in the bottom and leaked water everywhere. Woke up in the morning with a flooded yard. Would recommend finding a different pool. Besides the frustration of a flooded yard, time spent putting it together, and wasted water....the kids were extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: dgb

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pool for the money. Definitely buy chlorine, PH increase/decrease and alkalinity increaser in addition to this pool. It has a filter but the filter alone won’t keep the pool balanced. I made the mistake of filling the pool without chemicals and our filter was clogged after 3 days. I was able to wash the filter and it ran again but having proper chemicals helps a ton to keep your filter going longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously terribly customer service
customer_reviews.text: Product is excellent but, Intex is impossible to reach by phone and VM Express, who this item was bought from appears to be just as impossible to correspond with. My inquiry was regarding a liner replacement due to animal damage. Their answer had nothing even remotely to do with my inquiry "Thanks for reaching out regarding the issue you're experiencing. I looked up your order and according to our records, your item was delivered on 6/15/2019. This puts us outside of our 30-day return policy so we cannot assist with any sort of refund or replacement. I'm sorry that we're unable to do more for you at this time"
customer_reviews.author: Debra R. Shaver

customer_reviews.title: Works well and sturdy. Used as a quick refreshing dip by adults during the SC heat. Basically a big hot tub sized pool.
customer_reviews.text: Came with a slow leak in the bottom. Intex replaced with a new liner free of charge. Overall a good product for the money. If my 2nd one has a leak next summer, I'll rate again. Big enough for 2 adults on rafts.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L. Mabrey

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a Stay at home summer! Me and my 55 year old mother put the pool together! It was pretty easy to do too! No holes thankfully! Worth it for sure! Hoping the pump will be able to keep going. I haven’t read great reviews on it. So we will see! Wish they didn’t raise the price $100 when everything went down. Supply and demand I guess? Or just taking advantage of the situation?
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Pump is leaking!
customer_reviews.text: The pool is fine but the pump has started leaking after only a few days! The plastic hose also has a small pin hole in it and is leaking. I don’t know who to contact to get the pump replaced! Not satisfied at all with the pump
customer_reviews.author: Terri Spellane

customer_reviews.title: Pool-great; filter-useless
customer_reviews.text: If I could separate the pool from the filter I would give the pool a 4-5 star rating. The filter, on the other hand, is a worthless piece of crap. Ours worked for only two weeks and then stopped. We had to purchase a separate pool filter from the same company and it’s absolutely wonderful. It’s night and day. Don’t waste your time purchasing the pool with the filter, just buy the pool and then a better filter separately.
customer_reviews.author: Likesavalue

customer_reviews.title: Terrible pump
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pool as a Christmas gift for our children. We put it together late July. It was absolutely wonderful, afer three weeks the pump has stopped working. My neighbors bought theirs at Walmart after seeing ours, and theirs looks band new.. works just fine what am I to do ? Disassemble it and send it back?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No pool, got a blow up queen mattress,  really
customer_reviews.text: I did not get what I ordered got a blow up queen mattress in place of the pool, I was very upset, people pulling orders did not look close enough what was ordered
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good buy for price.
customer_reviews.text: We were just looking for something to get us throught this summer before investing in a bigger pool. Pump was not effective for this size pool & we ended up buying another one same week we got it. Also if you have very active children over the age of 8yrs you might want invest in something a bit more sturdier. Overall a good buy for price, if about considerations are understood.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlylopez

customer_reviews.title: Purchase one, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Ah man am I happy I purchased this for my three children! Its an amazing size for 3 kids under 10years old. I purchased the optional ladder, pool cover, chlorine tabs, testing strips, large tarp, and 4 replacement H type filters. I assembled it myself in a little over an hour. It was a very straight forward assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepless in Buffalo

customer_reviews.title: I fully recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We love love love our new pool, specially during lockdown. We’re recommending it all our friends, that way they’ll stay busy and maintain the social distancing that we’re required. Me and hubby get im from time to time after we finish working from home. It’s so relaxing. Also, the quality is good and it holds my kitty’s claws pretty well without breaking lol.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: ***Excellent Quality***
customer_reviews.text: This pool is perfect for the space that we have and the quality is outstanding! It is so easy to put up and take down...my wife does it without any problems whatsoever. (No, I am not sexist,lol) In the fall we simply fold it up, put it back in it's original box, and lower the hot tub back into position. Highly recommended product!
customer_reviews.author: B!RD

customer_reviews.title: It is actually easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: As soon as we received it we assembled it right away. It is actually easy to assemble. Me and my husband was able to finished assembling in less than 1 hour. Everybody is having fun especially my 2 sons. The size is perfect for us (family of 4). There’s still a lot of room to swim around. If I’ll purschase another one, I’ll get the same brand but a deeper one, 42”.
customer_reviews.author: Mayet

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of time
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pool and it leaked on my first full of water. Total waste of time do not purchase it
customer_reviews.author: Neeraj Arjoon

customer_reviews.title: Support nightmare
customer_reviews.text: This is a good pool. However, ours started leaking after 2 months. We bought this from Amazon with optional extended warranty. We contacted Amazon, and were redirected to seller. Seller asked us to contact Intex. Looks like seller does not want stand behind the product.
customer_reviews.author: Gaurav

customer_reviews.title: Great pool!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter are 3 and 5 and they love playing in this pool. It is perfect for them! It was very easy to set up and was very sturdy. We did have a problem with a rip in the bottom of the pool after a couple weeks of use but I contacted the seller and they were very helpful with getting a replacement sent out to us in just a couple of days. I would definitely recommend this pool for anyone with young children. It is going to make their summer and mine much more enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Bg

customer_reviews.title: The Worst
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. We received our pool today and my husband has spent all day repairing holes and it is still leaking. POS.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin R. Berry

customer_reviews.title: Clean filter often
customer_reviews.text: Only negative thing I will say is I have to clean out the filter twice a week but I like that I can reuse it a few times before buying a new one. I use the Intex cover also and my filter gets dirty fast. My kids love this pooly 2 year old can stand up in it and my 5 year old is learning how to swim in it.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Morris

customer_reviews.title: FILTER IS NOT POWERFUL ENOUGH
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent pool for young kids to keep cool but the filter on this pool is terrible. It just doesn't filter the pool well enough for the size of pool. I spent alot of additional money trying to keep it clean since the filter wasn't powerful enough.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Rose

customer_reviews.title: Best buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: Pool has been great all summer. My kids have really enjoyed it. I purchased this one because I wanted a short pool so it wasn't too deep for my 4 year old. The filter needs to be replaced weekly, and the pump is on the small side but as long as you take care of the pool it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Pintail

customer_reviews.title: Great pool.
customer_reviews.text: Great pool. Set it up in 30 min. Very sturdy, thick liner, roomy. Easy to care for. Only thing is next year I’ll get a bit bigger pump, the one included works pretty well, but one just a bit bigger would be great. Great product, excellent product for such a low price. Going to purchase another for my son’s house.
customer_reviews.author: Trista Abrams

customer_reviews.title: Great pool for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great pool for the money. A little smaller than expected but still a decent size. My husband and I are able to get in with our 5 year old, not much of a swim but big enough to play and relax in. We also love that it is really sturdy and not cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: mackie

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Zero stars isn’t an option. I live in California, so a leaking seal is a VERY expensive flaw! I woke up after filling the pool to see half the water had leaked out. After duct taping the leak, I reached out for a refund on pool as I have a massive water bill....and could he potentially fined for draining pool water. They offered me a replacement seal?! How would I do that when the pool is full with water?!! They never replied after that to make it right. DO NOT buy this product
customer_reviews.author: krista

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Tough enough to withstand three kids for the summer and cheap enough not to matter if it didn’t. Great option if you don’t want to get into a “real” size pool. Easy to use and maintain and better than constantly setting up a smaller kids pool.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan_H

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy about ripped material.
customer_reviews.text: We loved the pool, but it only lasted one summer. We had to empty the pool in order to clean it properly (our toddler had an accident) and it got a tear in the bottom and we were unable to put it back together correctly. We were hoping to get more than one season out of this product. So we are disappointed with the end result.
customer_reviews.author: Maryanna Freehoff

customer_reviews.title: I love this pool! You will buy a bigger pump though.
customer_reviews.text: Best buy of this year for me! Tons of fun and easy to set up. After a month my pump stopped working well and water turned green but I was expecting that from reading other reviews. New filter did not help. I just bought a bigger pump and I'm sure it will be perfect again!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Ann Clinghan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect pool , love it and my family love and we even thing of buying a bigger one , the only slight issue I have with pumps is, it stop working after a day or two , however, if cleaned it every two or three days , it back in working perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Susanna Mensah

customer_reviews.title: Cool pool
customer_reviews.text: My kids enjoyed themselves playing in the pool. The only bad thing is that the filter little heads in the inside of the pool is not soft and my nine year old kept hurting himself with it . Kids jump so if it could be softer would be nice
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Great pool for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great little pool for my grandkids! Easy to setup and no issue. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Ae

customer_reviews.title: Bent pole
customer_reviews.text: It came with one of the poles bent I don’t know if it happened in transit or what. But for that reason it’s lower on one side. Otherwise nice pool the kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A.

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy pool, my kids can stand on the edge and jump into the pool and it doesn’t feel like it’s going to break. There’s not great instructions on how to put the pump together, the pump also feels pretty cheap but it wasn’t very expensive either
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Love it for my small backyard!
customer_reviews.text: we love it! it was pretty easy to set up. i've only had it set up for about 6 weeks now, so i can't say how long it will last, but so far i am very happy with it. they provide an instructional DVD as well, but I didn't use it and only went by the written instructions.
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: Level level level site.
customer_reviews.text: Great pool for the money. Stock pump work good for 2 days. Hook up intex skimmer pump would shut off. Stock pump not powerful enough. I went ahead upgrade to 10" intex krystal clear sand pump. Actual water measurements around 26 to 27 inches. If you feel that high kids jump and play alot of water gets splash out. About 24" height is perfect right above the return outlet. Make sure site is level.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brock

customer_reviews.title: not good in the direct sun
customer_reviews.text: not good in the direct sun. fittings rotted and flooded back yard after a few months. the damage done was 2 times what we payed for the pool, and we tossed it out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 4 and she has loved it! Short enough that I can sit in a lawn chair and watch and deep enough that she feels brave! Easy set up and sturdy enough that a simple stool works as a step to get in and out! Big enough for 3 floaters and splashing! I have discovered that intex makes good floaties too!
customer_reviews.author: Adrea Bezdicek

customer_reviews.title: Crappy pump, good pool
customer_reviews.text: Pool itself is great. Filter pump sucks, it does not have enough power to circulate the water throughout the pool. I keep it the water meticulous and free of debris and bacteria, however, almost every day for the past week it clogs. I have to take the cartridge out and put it back in to get it to push the water through. This is a brand new filter pump Ive only been using for a month or 2.
customer_reviews.author: garrett w rogers

customer_reviews.title: The set up was pretty easy and the DVD guide made very confident when ...
customer_reviews.text: The set up was pretty easy and the DVD guide made very confident when it came time to set up. However, once I began filling up the pool I noticed ground was wet. Their must be a very small leak somewhere at the bottom of the pool. Not sure if I should contract the company or not (previous reviews said they are of no help). Oh well, I guess that the risk I was taking buying an affordable pool.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Clyde Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Goes up fast and easy
customer_reviews.text: Right now I couldn't afford a pool that we would leave up all year I'm more expensive above ground pool but this fool fit the bill and we've had a lot of fun in it going to take it down in the fall and see how it looks when I take it out to set it up next summer.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Matthew Maiara

customer_reviews.title: Great little pool
customer_reviews.text: We wanted something inexpensive to cool off in on days we don’t want to travel . This was perfect. Easy to assemble. My 10 year old has had days of fun in this with friends. Perfect !
customer_reviews.author: Avid shopper123

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Love the pool.. super easy to setup and so far has been great!
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: doesnt last leaks
customer_reviews.text: This pool is very disappointing this is the second one we bought just in case the first one was just a bad batch. They only lasted 2 months then started leaking at the seams both times! way to much to pay for a pool that leaks after 2 months and we had a $300 water bill on top of that!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy liner and no support
customer_reviews.text: Nonexistent support. And the liner is not very sturdy - I’ve been patching pinhole leaks and tears despite several layers of tarp between the liner and a cement foundation. Cleaning accessories I pursued from INTEX did not work as advertised either but given there’s no support, I can’t find out if I’m doing something wrong.
customer_reviews.author: SamVR

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: The pool took me less than an hour to assemble. We live in California and have a small backyard. This was perfect for us. I have an 8, 6 and 3 year old and they can all play together in it. I only plan to use it for the season. At this price I’ll buy a new one next year.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Ballance

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 10x10ft' size
customer_reviews.text: Great Above ground pool! The Pump also work great! Recommended not fill up water over the water outlet locate inside of the pool. It will keep longer life filter.
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and take down and also to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a must for any south texas home! Easy to set up and take down and also to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it, bad idea!!!
customer_reviews.text: Pool leaked immediately, VM innovations unwilling to help, pool manufacture has terrible customer service as well. Stay AWAY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This pool was VERY easy to put together! Honestly the best money we have ever spent. We love it! It is perfect for my daughter and I to float on our rafts and get some sun.
customer_reviews.author: SLN

customer_reviews.title: not bult to last
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pool for my daughter. it was very easy to assemble however after a couple of months. the pool started leaking from everywhere. The whole bottom of the pool started unstitching? and it started leaking water everywhere. It lasted me a full 2 months. very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Lorena juarez

customer_reviews.title: Super easy setup!
customer_reviews.text: No leaks so far. Very easy setup. Little pump is effective. It’s been up for 3 weeks in very hot weather and perfectly clear water. I’m running the pump every day for 2 to 3 hours. We also laid gym mats underneath. Cools me off just as well as my $100K pool did.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good value if you are patient while assembling
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to put together, but once it’s up this is a great little backyard pool. I buy these or a version of this pool every summer for PT and stretching, also great when it’s hot to just float around on a small raft.
customer_reviews.author: J. Winslow

customer_reviews.title: My Grandchildren love this pool
customer_reviews.text: Its a great pool however the filter doesn't help clean the pool, and you can't hook up a vacuum to it because it isn't strong enuf. Other than that it's a refreshing pool for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy L. Fincken

customer_reviews.title: Missing liner, small filter
customer_reviews.text: The pool is very easy to set up / put together. However the filter is too small for the size of the pool and it doesn’t clean the water, even if you put the shock. In addition there was a missing item: the liner that goes underneath the pool did not come!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pool/iffy filter
customer_reviews.text: This pool was a perfect solution for our backyard. The pump is not perfect and we will invest in a bigger one next summer. You need to change the filter about every two days to keep the water moving. The pool and frame itself though have been better than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I put this together in about an hour by ourselves. It was a lot of fun for my nieces and cousins. For about a week. The pump just stopped working, can’t figure out why. Great price but wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Brealynn Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Pump motor died after just 3-days!
customer_reviews.text: I read the other reviews about the pump motor, but expected it to last more than 3-days! Pool itself is sturdy and perfect size for my 9-yr old to splash around in and for my landscaper husband to cool off in after a hot days work. Will take others advice and buy a better pump, and hope it will hold up!
customer_reviews.author: Bay Mama

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad pool
customer_reviews.text: Pool has a leak that I had to find and patch up . Not sure how to but will find a way to deal with . Leak found after filling up the pool with water.
customer_reviews.author: nedo

customer_reviews.title: My kids LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pool. Especially for younger kids and even adults. If your just getting it for older kids/adults maybe get the bigger one but I have two little kids and my toddler can stand in it. I still use a puddle jumper for safety but the height helps a lot. We upgraded our filter and it’s staying very very clean. For the price u cannot beat it!
customer_reviews.author: CCC811

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! Can’t beat the product for the price. Took us about an hour to set up (2 people) - including the filter. It felt a little flimsy until the water got into it - but it’s holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Dorris

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Great pool so far pump does it’s job and keeps water crystal clear. Kids getting a lot use out of it. Easy set up & doesn’t take up a lot of space. 4 kids in it and they have plenty of space.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Good starter pool
customer_reviews.text: Got the pool and set it up. Everything was there, but the hose clamps were for a larger pool, but other than that the pool is great.
customer_reviews.author: zach

customer_reviews.title: Great pool for the price
customer_reviews.text: We upgraded our pool setup from the inflatable top ring style to this. The inflatable ring one would collapse on itself a few times every summer because it's on a very slight slope.. this one is standing strong, even when my kids hang on the sides! I love the filtration system, it does get clogged pretty fast but once I clean the filter it's good as new. Definitely worth the $$!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: great pool
customer_reviews.text: For the money it cost you it would be hard to find a better value. Its easy and straight forward to put together, the pump that comes with it is not that great but it gets the job done. My kids are in this thing all the time and have alot of fun age 10 and 6 and thats why i bought it, they are happy so im happy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Tryon

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great price great pool even though it's a small or one we even had adults getting in it now I have to upgrade to a larger pool
customer_reviews.author: D. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: CAREFUL!  Inspect liner before you fill!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about this pool. However, I recently filled it up and there must be tiny pin hole leaks on the bottom of the pool because there is water outside the perimeter everyday. I am hoping it will at least last the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: always what h what you click
customer_reviews.text: I guess in all the looking I put in the wrong one. I wanted a larger one that was 10 dollars cheaper
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great Investment for this summer already! I will admit, it took two of us for easy installation however it was very simple and quick to do. No issues with the pool what so ever, have had it up about a month now. Perfect height for easy access, fits two large floaties for adult tanning or relaxation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: The pool itself is very well made perfect size and easy to set up the only thing is that you will need a larger pump as the pump that came with it couldn't feel her a puddle on the street
customer_reviews.author: Km

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The pool.is a great size for my 7 amd 6 year olds. Fits on the patio perfect Assembly is simple my only complaint is the pump/ filter system is not very good. Overall a great deal and my kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: lisa m schumann

customer_reviews.title: Great pool
customer_reviews.text: This pool is amazing best thing we ever bought on amazon and the price was super competitive.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: A great little pool that can't be punctured by kitty claws
customer_reviews.text: A great little pool that can't be punctured by kitty claws! The perfect size for seniors to use for stretching, kicking and lounging with an iced tea. I set this up by myself and found it quite easy.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this size pool for our 4 yo- and so glad I did, he loves it! Easy to set up, fills quickly, pump isn’t as strong as a normal pool- but knew that going into it. Easy to keep clean, even bought the cover which works and fits great! Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Macy

customer_reviews.title: A Very Nice Pool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandkids - they love it! We really can't afford a bigger pool but this is a nice size for them to have some water fun on a hot day. It's easy to put up and maintain.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila D. Young

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my three young kids
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my three young kids. It did get a small hole on the bottom of the pool with in the first week, but the was more our fault for missing a rock than the quality of the pool. My only complaints is the pump seems too weak for the pool size.
customer_reviews.author: Ceara Therrien

customer_reviews.title: Pump stopped working after a week.
customer_reviews.text: The pump stopped working after a WEEK. Definitely a 2 person set up. Really displeased with the pump. Makes me very very sad and unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Kateisgreaat

customer_reviews.title: This is an extremely nice, small pool intended for small children
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely nice, small pool intended for small children. Got it for our granddaughter who is five years old and she loves to play in it. It was easy to assemble and came with everything necessary except treatment chemicals. The frame and the pool material seem quite durable. We have been very happy with this purchase especially considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this backyard retreat.
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this pool fulfills a need to stay cool in temperatures exceeding 110 degrees in sunny but blistering Arizona. It's sturdy, easy to assemble for two people and it's a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Marcella Aller

customer_reviews.title: Should come with better filter.
customer_reviews.text: Dislike with the filter, problems with the reset button., after about 3 weeks we ordered a better filter and have a much better outcome. We could have sent filter back, they would have looked at it found the problem and sent us a new one. Meanwhile pool would be turning green. We are happier with better filter. We should send old filter back for a credit.
customer_reviews.author: John thompson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a 2 and 4-yr-old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a 2 and 4-yr-old. The filter is cheap and it leaks constantly despite layers of plumbing thread tape. DO NOT put this on a deck as I've seen people talking about. When filled this thing would weigh a couple tons. Would you park a tow truck on your deck?
customer_reviews.author: timothy george kallas

customer_reviews.title: Great pool
customer_reviews.text: This pool was easy to set up and seems sturdy. Great value for the money! We have lots of fun playing in this pool.
customer_reviews.author: ash c

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pool for our four and two year olds. They absolutely loved it. They were in it al summer on a very regular basis. Sometimes multiply times a day. Very durable and easy to keep clean with the pump and floating chlorine dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this pool!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pool for the kids (or adults too!) to play and cool of in the summer. It’s not very deep, but much larger than a “kiddie” pool. My kids (ages 6 and 9) have spent hours in it this summer. Fairly easy to set up too. I have purchased the Intex 10’ pool with the inflatable ring in past years, but this one is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks right away and busted open.
customer_reviews.text: Busted open while In use a couple weeks after we bought it. Several leaks right away.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Not too big, not too small.
customer_reviews.text: This was extremely easy to put up and a perfect size to cool off. Usually three of us in with plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping!!! Amazing pool for the price i enjoyed it with my kids and family everyone fits !!!! Love it very pleased .
customer_reviews.author: Jany

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cute little pool. The kids and dogs love it!
customer_reviews.author: Fl Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great pool
customer_reviews.text: Pool is great and perfect size for my family of 6. Easy set up and sturdy. 4 stars because the filter pump is really weak and sometimes doesn't do it's job. We have to shake it or bang it on the floor a few times to wake it up.
customer_reviews.author: See Vang

product_meta.title: Intex Metal Frame Pool Set, 10-Feet x 30-Inch
product_meta.description: 10 feet x 30 inches Metal Frame Pool Set with 330 gallon filter pump, 110-120 voltage DFCI, DVD beautiful, easy-to-assemble, durable and designed for years of family and neighborhood fun. Ready for water in 30 minutes. Water capacity (90 percent full): 1,185 gallons.
feature_bullets: Metal frame pool set with filter pump
Durable and designed for years of family and neighborhood fun
